text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode

is what I call my cranberry and pear
sauce which is really good and the

tartness of the cranberry it's just
really delicious now let me take you
over the ingredients so you can get

some granulated sugar these there's just
some two of Bosc pears that I've peeled
quartered cored and chopped oranges

let's get right into it this is so

you know I don't add the pairs with the

keep their shape and just gives you a

cranberries have a lot of natural pectin

very liquidy now but as this cools in

that natural gelling this that we just
love about cranberry sauce that's what

more special a little bit different

they cooked for her an additional in
